https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qhpM2vn309eURzpurzbfxf3cbfl.jpg A boy, an old man, two beautiful twin sisters get caught up in a voyeuristic scandal during the Cultural Revolution in China. This controversial film was subsequently banned and was never made public in China. A Beautiful Mistake
